{{- $version := split hugo.Version "." }} {{- $major := int (index $version 0) }} {{- $minor := int (index $version 1) }} {{- $id := "" }} {{- if and (ge $major 0) (ge $major 108) }} {{- $id = .Ordinal }} {{- end }} {{- partial "shortcodes/image.html" (dict "context" .Page "url" .Destination "title" .Title "alt" .Text "id" $id ) }}
